name: Arrow a Row
description:
·Run and Shoot automatically

This is an endless auto runner where the player only needs to go left or right. You can complete the game by defeating the boss or continue to beat your highest score.

·Lots Of Power-ups

Choose your power-ups wisely for different builds.

·Additional Helpers

You have pets and flying swords that help you fight the enemies.

·Permanent Upgrades

Purchase permanent upgrades to improve yourself.



Music by Ben Esdor
